You need only do the section for your own project data

## 🎄 *Arabidopisis*

🎬 Open your `arab-88H` Project. Make a new script, `cont-low-aerial.R`,
and, using `cont-low-root.R` as a template, repeat the analysis on the
aerial tissue.

## 💉 *Leishmania*

🎬 Open your `leish-88H` Project. Make a new script, `pro_ama.R`, and,
using `pro_meta.R` as a template, repeat the analysis on the procyclic
promastigotes (pro) and amastigotes (ama).

## 🐭 Stem cells

🎬 Open your `mice-88H` Project. Make a new script, `hspc-lthsc.R` and,
using `hspc-prog.R` as a template, repeat the analysis on the HSPC and
LT-HSC cells.
